```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE, wwarning = FALSE, message = FALSE)
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(broom)
library(MASS)

df <- read_excel(
    "../data/raw/2019-05_lvad-gib/data.xlsx",
    skip = 1,
    col_types = c(
        "numeric",
        "numeric",
        "logical",
        "numeric",
        "logical",
        "logical",
        "logical",
        "logical",
        "logical",
        "skip",
        "logical",
        "logical",
        "logical",
        "logical"
    ),
    col_names = c(
        "patient_id",
        "age",
        "female",
        "bmi",
        "afib",
        "cad",
        "htn",
        "dm",
        "gib_vad",
        "pump_thrombosis",
        "isch_cva",
        "pump_thromb_cva",
        "hemor_cva"
    )
)
```

# Univariate Logistic Regression Models

## Pump Thrombosis

### Age
```{r}
glm(pump_thrombosis ~ age, family = "binomial", data = df) %>%
    tidy() %>%
    knitr::kable(digits = 3)
```


# Multivariate Regression Models

## Pump Thrombosis

```{r}
glm(pump_thrombosis ~ age + female + bmi + afib + cad + htn + dm + gib_vad, family = "binomial", data = df) %>%
    tidy() %>%
    knitr::kable(digits = 3)
```

## Ischemic Stroke


# Stepwise Regression Models

## Pump Thrombosis

```{r}
glm(pump_thrombosis ~ age + female + bmi + afib + cad + htn + dm + gib_vad, family = "binomial", data = df) %>%
    stepAIC(direction = "backward", trace = FALSE) %>%
    tidy() %>%
    knitr::kable(digits = 3)
```

## Ischemic Stroke

```{r}
glm(isch_cva ~ age + female + bmi + afib + cad + htn + dm + gib_vad, family = "binomial", data = df) %>%
    stepAIC(direction = "backward", trace = FALSE) %>%
    tidy() %>%
    knitr::kable(digits = 3)
```
